name: Beat Immunity
description:
Beat Immunity

A three day gamejam game.

You're a white blood cell fighting invading bodies. Your defense follow the host's pulse, so watch your timing!

  • Jump, double jump, and roll.
  • You have regularly timed attacks to your facing direction.
  • Get upgrades that let you attack in other directions or when you're in the air.

Code: David, Sabastian

Art: Jeff, Sloth

Audio: Dany

Controls

Gamepad:

  • X -- Dash
  • A -- Jump
  • LS -- Move

Keyboard:

  • Shift/mouse1 -- Dash
  • Space/mouse2 -- Jump
  • wasd/arrows -- Move
Design Concept

A 2d platformer take on the timed strike genre pioneered by Vampire Survivors.

You don’t directly control your attacks. Instead, they’re on timers and you choose upgrades to change what kinds of attacks fire on those timers. The game is more about kiting and positioning than normal combat. I thought trying that in a platformer could be interesting.
